text: HTC One X is android smartphone developed by HTC. It was announced on February 26, 2012. It runs Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich. 4.7 inch Super IPS LCD2 312ppi display, 1800mAh battery capacity, 1GB RAM, 8MP back camera and 1.3MP front camera. == Reviews == Wired reviewing HTC One X, it is faster, beautiful and lighter, It has a very good battery lasts long time, The camera also very good. TechRadar reviewing HTC One X, It is very good screen, very beautiful design, faster processer and very good camera. HTC One X gets bad reviews like not very good battery, no MicroSD card and video blurry. == Software == HTC One X runs Android 4.0 Ice cream sandwich for first launch, they can upgrade other version like Android 4.1.1 jelly bean when came out. == Related pages == *HTC Evo 4G LTE == References == Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2012 Category:HTC mobile phones
title: HTC One X
